title: Senior Software Developer
description:
This is a once-in-a-generation opportunity for digital experts to improve millions of lives. DWP are going through one of the highest profile digital transformation programmes in the world and we’re advertising Senior Software Developer vacancies to find the talent to help deliver that change.

As a Senior Software Developer you will be responsible the development of the products which make up services for citizens across the UK using open source technologies like Java, JavaScript and Node.js.

Working with an agile team in one of our digital hubs in Newcastle, Leeds, Blackpool and Manchester, you will be responsible for the operational stability of the products you build, and be in a position to effect change in the on-going robustness, resilience and stability of those products.

You will contribute to the overall Software Development Lifecycle Process within Software Engineering, following the agreed Architectural & Software Engineering principles to ensure the products developed are fit for purpose.

DWP is an equal opportunity employer with a diverse workforce. We welcome applications regardless of age, gender, race or sexuality.
